key.name: first-time-opening-app
key.description: Whether or not this is the first time entering EZ-Stream.

key.name: last-opened-version-major
key.description: The most recently opened version of the application. Used for first-time experience (TBC)

key.name: last-opened-version-minor
key.description: The most recently opened version of the application. Used for first-time experience (TBC)

key.name: last-opened-version-patch
key.description: The most recently opened version of the application. Used for first-time experience (TBC)

key.name: p1-score
key.description: The last score typed into the P1 score box

key.name: p2-score
key.description: The last score typed into the P2 score box

key.name: p1-name
key.description: The last inputted name for P1

key.name: p2-name
key.description: The last inputted name for P2

key.name: last-opened-module
key.description: Holds the path of the last opened module. If there is no such module, or if this is empty, defaults to the "None" module

key.name: p1-character
key.description: The last character P1 was reported as playing. Ignored if the last opened module didn't persist.

key.name: p2-character
key.description: The last character P2 was reported as playing. Ignored if the last opened module didn't persist.
